info.title: Quality Notification - Read, Create
info.description: You can read and create data of quality notifications, for example, create a customer complaint or a complaint against a supplier. This includes header, item and task data as well as long texts for header, items and tasks.

x-sap-shortText: Read and create quality notifications (using this asynchronous inbound service)

values.text: Quality Notification and Defect Processing Integration(SAP_COM_0153)
[Quality Management in Discrete Manufacturing(1E1)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1E1 " Link To BP ")
[Quality Management in Stock Handling(1MR)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1MR " Link To BP ")

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
